text: Tetrafluoroborate is an anion, a chemical with a negative electrical charge, made of boron and fluorine. It has the chemical formula . Tetrafluoroborate is the Lewis adduct of boron trifluoride and the fluoride ion. Tetrafluoroborate is a weakly coordinating anion, so it does not react with many other chemicals. This makes it useful for making salts and solutions containing unstable cations. Category:Anions Category:Boron compounds Category:Fluorine compounds
title: Tetrafluoroborate
